Uses of Class
ray.ai.behaviortrees.BTBehavior

  • Packages that use BTBehavior 
    Package Description
    ray.ai.behaviortrees  

    • Uses of BTBehavior in ray.ai.behaviortrees

      Subclasses of BTBehavior in ray.ai.behaviortrees 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BTAction
      BTAction represents an action behavior node in a behavior tree.
      class  BTComposite
      A BTComposite node is an inner node that maintains a collection of BTBehavior child nodes.
      class  BTCondition
      A BTCondition node is a leaf node that performs a boolean check on read-only data gathered from the game world.
      class  BTDecorator
      BTDecorator is an abstract behavior node that contains a single BTBehavior child.
      class  BTRepeat
      BTRepeat is a BTDecorator node that processes its child nodes a specific number of times before returning a return status.
      class  BTSelector
      A BTSelector node is a BTComposite that executes its child nodes from left to right looking for first success.
      class  BTSequence
      A BTSequence node is a BTComposite that executes its child nodes from left to right.
      Fields in ray.ai.behaviortrees declared as BTBehavior 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected BTBehavior BTDecorator.child 
      Fields in ray.ai.behaviortrees with type parameters of type BTBehavior 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.Vector<BTBehavior> BTComposite.children 
      protected java.util.Iterator<BTBehavior> BTSequence.currentChild 
      protected java.util.Iterator<BTBehavior> BTSelector.currentChild 
      Methods in ray.ai.behaviortrees that return BTBehavior 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BTBehavior BTDecorator.getChild() 
      Methods in ray.ai.behaviortrees that return types with arguments of type BTBehavior 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Iterator<BTBehavior> BTComposite.getIterator() 
      Methods in ray.ai.behaviortrees with parameters of type BTBehavior 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BTComposite.addChild(BTBehavior child)
      Adds a new BTBehavior to the composite's collection of child nodes if the child isn't null.
      boolean BehaviorTree.insert(int id, BTBehavior node)
      Inserts a node into a composite node that already exists in the tree.
      boolean BehaviorTree.insertAtRoot(BTBehavior node)
      Inserts a node at the root of the tree.
      void BTComposite.removeChild(BTBehavior child)
      Removes the specified BTBehavior node from the composite's collection of child nodes.
      Constructors in ray.ai.behaviortrees with parameters of type BTBehavior 
      Constructor and Description
      BTDecorator(BTBehavior child)
      Constructs a BTDecorator node encapsulating a child node.
      BTRepeat(BTBehavior child, int repeatCount)
      Constructs a BTRepeat node encapsulating a child node and setting the repeat count.
